release.change: Update: The zone data for Köln has changed.
New: The app is translated to Dutch. Thanks Sjors van Mierlo and Pieter Jan Geutjens.
New: The app is translated to Polish. Thanks Tomasz Skowroński. FAQs are still missing.
New: The app is translated to Danish. Thanks Valar Markhulis. FAQs are still missing.
Android: The app is now optimized for Android 9 (Pie).
Update: The zone data for Freiburg im Breisgau has changed.
Gone: Remove the UserVoice feedback section. Almost no one submitted feedback there.
New: Introduce Diesel prohibition zones for Berlin, Hamburg and Stuttgart. Relevant detail information is shown on the city info screen.
Update: Revise "About" screen texts to address Diesel prohibition zones.
Android: The app is now optimized for Android 8.1 (Oreo).
Bugfix: Correct broken source code link in "About" screen.
Bugfix: Correctly center "About" screen texts horizontally.
Update: The new layout of the city info screen is prepared to display information of multiple zones such as a low emission zone and a Diesel prohibition zone.
Still internal refactorings are ongoing with the objective to show Diesel prohibition zones soon.
Update: The zone data for Augsburg has changed.
Update: New app icon complying with the icon specifications of Android 7 and newer.
New: The map view including the tilt angle is completely restored on device rotation.
New: Each zone circuit is colored with its corresponding badge color.
Bugfix: The formatting of the share message text is fixed.
Android: The app is now optimized for Android 8.0 (Oreo).
Android: Now the lowest, supported version is Android 4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich) due to updated restrictions applied by Google.
Many internal refactorings are ongoing with the objective to show Diesel prohibition zones soon.
Android: The app is now optimized for Android 7.1 (Nougat).
Android: The app is now optimized for Android 7.0 (Nougat).
Update: The zone data for Ludwigsburg has changed.
New: The city list has been restructured to allow displaying multiple zones in the near future (such as Diesel prohibition zones). Work in progress.
Bugfix: Google Analytics was disabled for all users due to a coding mistake. The error has been resolved.
Update: In order to protect your privacy even more the IP address of the device is anonymized before it is sent to Google Analytics.
New: The data privacy statement (German) is linked in settings.
Update: The zone data for Mainz is now officially provided by the city.

Android: The app is now optimized for Android 6.0 (Marshmallow) which requires users to grant permission before the "my location" feature can be used. The app shows a notice to do so if it is installed for the first time.
New: Google Analytics can now be configured in the settings. Google Analytics provides valuable information for the developer to further improve the app.
Update: Add two more e-mail addresses to contact Regensburg.
New: Limburg an der Lahn has a zone since January 31, 2018.
New: Regensburg has a zone since January 15, 2018. However, the city sells the geometry data for 225€. A request to publish the data without costs is pending.
Bugfix: Some of the weblinks pointing to "Further information online" had changed and are updated now.
Update: The zone data for Overath is now officially provided by the city.
Bugfix: Invitations to rate the app or to become a beta tester are not shown again if tapped before.
Android: Now the lowest, supported version is Android 2.3 (Gingerbread) to allow future development of the app.
New: Overath has a zone since October 01, 2017. The response to the data request is pending.
New: Balingen has a zone since April 01, 2017. Together with the city we managed to digitize the coordinates of the zone.
New: Users are invited to become beta testers.
New: Users are invited to rate the app.
Bugfix: Resolved rare crash at app startup (BadTokenException).
Update: Many internally used software components have been updated. Please reach out if you notice problems with the app.
Update: The zone data for Leipzig is now officially provided by the city.
Improved: Fix showing city info twice after rotating the device.
New: Add zone data with coordinates for Eschweiler (since 06/01/16).
Update: Augsburg only allows cars with a green badge as of June 1, 2016.
Update: Mention Duisburg in the list of cities of the Ruhrgebiet zone.
Improved: The URLs for "Further information online" in the "City info" screen are up-to-date now.
Improved: Prevent rare crash which happened during an update of a zone without coordinates.
New: Add zone data with coordinates for Marburg (since 04/01/16).
Update: Minor adjustments to the zone coordinates of Halle (Saale). Data has finally been provided by the city.
Display libraries in alphabetical order in "About" screen.
Improved: Parts of the underlying code have been rewritten to allow running automated tests.
New: Add zone data without coordinates for Marburg (since 04/01/16). The city still works on publishing the data.
Update: The zone of Halle slightly changed at 03/03/16. However, the city did not yet send the latest zone data!
Bugfix: Resolve crash on Android 2.3 when selecting a city.
Bugfix: Prevent crash when Google Play Services are not present.
Improved: Display slightly different text with respect to the current date for zones which become effective in the future.
Improved: Refactor "Share this app" feature to ensure compatibility with older Android versions.
New: Add zone data with coordinates for Aachen.
New: Add menu item "Share this app".
New: Add zone data without coordinates for Aachen (since 02/01/16). A request to the city has been made but waits for being answered.
New: Allow to show the map on the lock screen of your device.
Update: Add one more e-mail address to contact Wiesbaden.
Update: More detailed error information when crash happens.
New: Add zone data with coordinates for Darmstadt (since 11/01/15).
Bugfix: Resolved failure to restore the map state (zoom position) after the device has been rotated.

Update: Add one more contact e-mail for Wiesbaden.
Improved: High resolution app icon can now be shown on every device.
Improved: Add more tests to avoid introducing bugs.

New: A new fresh application icon.
Bugfix: Loading the default city on 1st application launch works as expected now.
